text: Ara tomara nijedera palanakarta samipe ksama prarthana kara. Anantara tamra'i prati manonibesa kara. Tahale tini tomaderake nirdista samaya paryanta utkrsta jibanopakarana dana karabena ebam adhika amalakarike besi kare debena ara yadi tomara bimukha hate thaka, tabe ami tomadera upara eka maha dibasera ayabera asanka karachi.
